title: Nvidia Posts Record Revenue as Videogaming Sales Soar
sub_head: Revenue reached $7.1 billion despite continuing chip shortage
body:
Graphics-chip company Nvidia Corp. posted another quarter of record sales amid supercharged demand for videogaming and data centers.
Americaâ€™s largest chip company by market value has enjoyed a period of strong growth with the pandemic boosting consumer appetite for videogames and the wider adoption of digital services that run on data centers.
